revised_title: Treatment of Mad Creatures and the Cure of Biting
tldr: The author shares a remedy for treating mad creatures and their bites, which involves bloodletting, washing, and administering a mixture of a certain herb and pepper in warm milk or broth. The remedy was effective in treating both humans and animals, and the author credits its success to the care and effort put into its application. The treatment was also found to prevent further madness in dogs that had been bitten by mad dogs.
